text: The Sword of Monte Cristo is a 1951 American adventure movie directed by Maurice Geraghty and is based on the 1844 novel The Count of Monte Cristo by Alexandre Dumas. It stars George Montgomery, Rita Corday, Berry Kroeger, William Conrad, Robert Warwick, Acquanetta, Trevor Bardette, Steve Darnell and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Sword of Monte Cristo
